title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.01
frontText: Which NTP command configures the local device as an NTP reference clock source?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.02
frontText: What is the subnet and broadcast address of this host: 10.16.3.65/23?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.03
frontText: Under which circumstance should a network administrator implement one‐way NAT?
backText: When the network has few public IP addresses, and many private IP addresses require outside Internet access

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.04
frontText: True/False. When configuring static routes, an exit interface can be specified to indicate where the packets will be routed.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.05
frontText: Which device allows users to connect to the network using a single or double radio?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.06
frontText: Which method does a connected trunk port use to tag VLAN traffic?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.07
frontText: True/False. This is a valid hostname for a switch following Cisco’s guidelines: 5witch‐Cisco.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.08
frontText: Which function enables an administrator to route multiple VLANs on a router?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.09
frontText: True/False. Routers perform this on a packet: Update the layer 3 headers of outbound packets so that the packets are properly directed to their ultimate destinations.
backText: False. They update the layer 2 headers of outbound packets with the MAC addresses of the next hop.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.10
frontText: True/False. Routers perform this on a packet: Examine the layer 3 headers of inbound packets and use that information to determine the next hops for the packets.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.11
frontText: A workstation has just resolved a browser URL to the IP address of a server. Which protocol will the workstation now use to determine the MAC address to be placed into frames directed toward the server?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.12
frontText: Which RFC was created to alleviate the depletion of IPv4 public addresses?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.13
frontText: Configuration of which option is required on a Cisco switch for the Cisco IP phone to work?
backText: A voice VLAN ID in interface and global configuration mode

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.14
frontText: At which layer of the OSI model does the protocol that provides the information that is displayed by the show cdp neighbors command operate?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.15
frontText: Two hosts are attached to a switch with the default configuration. How many broadcasts are there?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.16
frontText: On which type of device is every port in the same collision domain?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.17
frontText: What is the default lease title for a DHCP binding?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.18
frontText: Which MTU size can cause a baby giant error?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.19
frontText: True/False. Tracert uses ICMP packets.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.20
frontText: Which route source code represents the routing protocol with a default administrative distance of 90 in the routing table?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.21
frontText: Which component of the routing table ranks routing protocols according to their preferences?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.22
frontText: Which component of a routing table entry represents the subnet mask?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.23
frontText: Which value is indicated by the next hop in a routing table?
backText: IP address of the remote router for forwarding the packets

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.24
frontText: Which dynamic routing protocol uses only the hop count to determine the best path to a destination?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.25
frontText: Which feature allows a device to use a switch port that is configured for half‐duplex to access the network?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.26
frontText: A transmitting host MAC address is not in the MAC table of a switch. What will the switch will do when it receives the frame from the host?
backText: The switch will add the source address and port to the MAC address table and forward the frame to the destination host if known; if not, it will flood the frame.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.27
frontText: What is one requirement for interfaces to run IPv6?
backText: An IPv6 address must be configured on the interface.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.28
frontText: Which routing protocol has the default administrative distance of 90?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.29
frontText: Which technology supports the stateless assignment of IPv6 addresses?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.30
frontText: By default, how many MAC addresses are permitted to be learned on a switch port with port security enabled?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.31
frontText: Which NAT type is used to translate a single inside address to a single outside address?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.32
frontText: True/False. Cisco Discovery Protocol traffic travels on the native VLAN by default.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.33
frontText: Which address type does a switch use to make selective forwarding decisions?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.34
frontText: True/False. TCP provides sequence numbering of packets.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.35
frontText: True/False. TCP provides synchronized communication.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.36
frontText: On a Cisco switch, which protocol determines if an attached VoIP phone is from Cisco or from another vendor?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.37
frontText: Which destination IP address can a host use to send one message to multiple devices across different subnets?
backText: A multicast address. Range is 224.0.0.0 through 239.255.255.255.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.38
frontText: When enabled, which feature prevents routing protocols from sending hello messages on an interface?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.39
frontText: True/False. WLC’s Gold queue is also known as the video queue.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.40
frontText: Which option must occur before a workstation can exchange HTTP packets with a web server?
backText: A TCP connection must be established between the workstation and the web server.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.41
frontText: True/False. If the destination MAC address is unknown, the frame is flooded to every port that is in the same VLAN, except the port it was received on.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.42
frontText: When a router makes a routing decision for a packet that is received from one network and destined to another, which portion of the packet is replaced?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.43
frontText: Which network topology allows all traffic to flow through a central hub?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.44
frontText: True/False. OSPF is a link‐state routing protocol.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.45
frontText: True/False. RIP is a link‐state routing protocol.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.46
frontText: Which two states are the port states when RSTP has converged?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.47
frontText: WLANs default to the _______ queue, which effectively means no QoS is being utilized.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.48
frontText: Which Cisco platform can verify ACLs?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.49
frontText: Which type of switch ports drop packets with 802.1Q tags?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.50
frontText: You enter the show ipv6 route command on a router and the device displays a route. What routing protocol is used?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.51
frontText: Which switch states are valid for 802.1w?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.52
frontText: What can cause collision domain issues on VLAN domain?
backText: Congestion on the switch inband path, BS duplex mismatches on Ethernet segments in the same VLAN

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.53
frontText: What is a benefit of switch stacking?
backText: It provides higher port density with better resource usage.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.54
frontText: What protocol supports sharing the VLAN configuration between two or more switches?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.55
frontText: Which part of the PPPoE server configurator contains the information used to assign an IP address to a PPPoE client?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.56
frontText: What process is associated with spanning‐tree convergence?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.57
frontText: Which type of interface can negotiate an IP address for a PPPoE client?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.58
frontText: What is the purpose of traffic policing?
backText: It drops traffic that exceeds the CIR.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.59
frontText: Which IEEE standard does PVST+ use to tunnel information?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.60
frontText: Which version of SNMP first allowed user‐based access?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.61
frontText: What are two drawbacks of implementing a link‐state routing protocol?
backText: The requirement for a hierarchical IP addressing scheme for optimal functionality, and high demand on router resources to run the link‐state routing algorithm

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.62
frontText: What is a difference between TACACS+ and RADIUS in AAA?
backText: Only TACACS+ allows for separate authentication.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.63
frontText: What is the default VLAN on an access port?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.64
frontText: True/False. IP SLAs are used to determine the frequency of ICMP packets.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.65
frontText: What is a valid HSRP virtual MAC address?
backText: Look for the 07.AC in the address, such as: 0000.0C07.AC15.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.66
frontText: Which feature can you use to monitor traffic on a switch by replicating it to another port or ports on the same switch?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.67
frontText: True/False. Video traffic is passed with a well‐known DSCP value of 46.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.68
frontText: What are two enhancements that OSPFv3 supports over OSPFv2?
backText: It can support multiple IPv6 subnets on a single link, and it routes over links rather than over networks.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.69
frontText: Which protocol authenticates connected devices before allowing them to access the LAN?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.70
frontText: Describe slow inter‐VLAN forwarding.
backText: The local VLAN is working normally, but traffic to the alternate VLAN is forwarded more slowly than expected.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.71
frontText: True/False. Intelligent DNS can redirect user requests to locations that are using fewer network resources.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.72
frontText: What configuration must you apply to enable encapsulation on a subinterface?
backText: Answer Example (can use any numbers from 1–4094):

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.73
frontText: True/False. When a switch in rapid PVST+ mode has a topology change, the switch immediately deletes dynamic MAC addresses that were learned by all ports on the switch.
backText: False. It deletes all MAC addresses in that one VLAN instance.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.74
frontText: True/False. Named ACLs support only extended ACLs.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.75
frontText: How can you disable DTP on a switch port?
backText: Change the operational mode to static access.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.76
frontText: Which identification numbers are valid for an extended ACL?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.77
frontText:
IndexLoadPortEC stateNo of bits
036Gil/1Active3
184Gil/2Active3
216Gil/3Active2
You executed the show interface port-channel 1 etherchannel command. What information is provided by the Load value?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.78
frontText: True/False. DTP uses the native VLAN to send data.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.79
frontText: Which spanning‐tree feature places a port immediately into a forwarding state?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.80
frontText: Which type of topology is required by DMVPN?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.81
frontText: Which component of the Cisco SDN solution serves as the centralized management system?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.82
frontText: MPLS operates at what layer?
backText: It operates between layer 2 and layer 3.

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.83
frontText: What is the best way to verify that a host has a path to other hosts in different networks?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.84
frontText: Which EIGRP for IPv6 command can you enter to view the link‐local addresses of the neighbors of a device?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.85
frontText: What is the first step you perform to configure an SNMPv3 user?

title: fc659181.CCNACert.SG.86
frontText: True/False. EIGRPv6 needs a RID under the routing process.
